title: Pirate Tycoon, Forbidden Baby
description: The pirate Brooding, dangerous hotel tycoon André Gauthier has whisked Kira across the Caribbean Sea to his stunning island hideaway. He doesn't just want to bed her with a ruthless passion…he wants revenge!The kidnapped One hot touch has Kira desperate to slip back between André's sheets! But first she must tell him that she's having his baby….André is convinced Kira betrayed him with his enemy. He has to uncover the secret she's hiding—if he's to claim his child!
author: Janette Kenny
